verses.verse: וּבְיוֹם֩ <WH3117> u-ve-yOm day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim Now in the twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah and fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh of this month הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, of this נֶאֶסְפ֤וּ <WH622> ne-'es-Fu were assembled בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּצ֣וֹם <WH6685> be-Tzom with fasting וּבְשַׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> u-ve-sak-Kim, and with sackclothes וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> va-'a-da-Mah and earth עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. and

וַיִּבָּֽדְלוּ֙ <WH914> vai-yib-ba-de-Lu separated זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra' And the seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei afflicted נֵכָ֑ר <WH5236> ne-Char; alien וַיַּעַמְד֗וּ <WH5975> vai-ya-'am-Du, and stood וַיִּתְוַדּוּ֙ <WH3034> vai-yit-vad-Du and confessed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and חַטֹּ֣אתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2403> chat-To-tei-Hem, their sins וַעֲוֹנ֖וֹת <WH5771> va-'a-vo-Not and the iniquities אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> 'a-vo-tei-Hem. of their fathers

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> vai-ya-Ku-mu And they stood up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in עָמְדָ֔ם <WH5977> 'a-me-Dam, in their place וַֽיִּקְרְא֗וּ <WH7121> vai-yik-re-'U, and read בְּסֵ֨פֶר <WH5612> be-Se-fer in the book תּוֹרַ֧ת <WH8451> to-Rat of the law יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem their God רְבִעִ֣ית <WH7243> re-vi-'It [one] fourth part הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; of the day וּרְבִעִית֙ <WH7243> u-re-vi-'It and [another] fourth part מִתְוַדִּ֣ים <WH3034> mit-vad-Dim they confessed וּמִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔ים <WH7812> u-mish-ta-cha-Vim, and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God פ Peh

וַיָּ֜קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom Then stood up עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מַֽעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> ma-'a-Leh upon the stairs הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, of the Levites יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua וּבָנִ֜י <WH1137> u-va-Ni and Bani קַדְמִיאֵ֧ל <WH6934> kad-mi-'El Kadmiel שְׁבַנְיָ֛ה <WH7645> she-van-Yah Shebaniah בֻּנִּ֥י <WH1138> bun-Ni Bunni שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <WH8274> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah בָּנִ֣י <WH1137> ba-Ni Bani כְנָ֑נִי <WH3662> che-Na-ni; [and] Chenani וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> vai-yiz-'a-Ku and cried בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol voice גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, with a loud אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said הַלְוִיִּ֡ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim Then the Levites יֵשׁ֣וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua וְ֠קַדְמִיאֵל <WH6934> Ve-kad-mi-'el and Kadmiel בָּנִ֨י <WH1137> ba-Ni Bani חֲשַׁבְנְיָ֜ה <WH2813> cha-shav-ne-Yah Hashabniah שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֤ה <WH8274> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah הֽוֹדִיָּה֙ <WH1941> ho-di-Yah Hodijah שְׁבַנְיָ֣ה <WH7645> she-van-Yah Shebaniah פְתַֽחְיָ֔ה <WH6611> fe-tach-Yah, [and] Pethahiah ק֗וּמוּ <WH6965> Ku-mu, Stand up בָּרֲכוּ֙ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu [and] bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הָעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ha-'o-Lam for ever עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against הָעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ha-'o-Lam; and ever וִיבָֽרְכוּ֙ <WH1288> vi-va-re-Chu and blessed שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem name כְּבוֹדֶ֔ךָ <WH3519> ke-vo-De-cha, be thy glorious וּמְרוֹמַ֥ם <WH7311> u-me-ro-Mam which is exalted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּרָכָ֖ה <WH1293> be-ra-Chah above all blessing וּתְהִלָּֽה׃ <WH8416> u-te-hil-Lah. and praise

אַתָּה־ <WH859> 'at-tah- you ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh Thou [even] thou [art] LORD לְבַדֶּךָ֒ <WH905> le-vad-de-Cha alone; אַתְּ 'at כאַתָּ֣ה <WH853> 'at-Tah קעָשִׂ֡יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta alone thou hast made אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשָּׁמַיִם֩ <WH8064> hash-sha-ma-Yim heaven שְׁמֵ֨י <WH8064> she-Mei the heaven הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heavens וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all צְבָאָ֗ם <WH6635> tze-va-'Am, with all their host הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha is on הַיַּמִּים֙ <WH3220> hai-yam-Mim and all [things] that [are] therein the seas וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah You מְחַיֶּ֣ה <WH2421> me-chai-Yeh and all that [is] therein and thou preservest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; to all וּצְבָ֥א <WH6635> u-tze-Va them all and the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven לְךָ֥ le-Cha מִשְׁתַּחֲוִֽים׃ <WH7812> mish-ta-cha-Vim. worshippeth

אַתָּה־ <WH859> 'at-tah- you הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu You יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Thou [art] the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, the God אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who בָּחַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH977> ba-Char-ta who didst choose בְּאַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> be-'av-Ram, Abram וְהוֹצֵאת֖וֹ <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-To and broughtest him forth מֵא֣וּר <WH218> me-'Ur out of Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <WH3778> kas-Dim; of the Chaldees וְשַׂ֥מְתָּ <WH7760> ve-Sam-ta and gavest שְּׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo him the name אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham. of Abraham

וּמָצָ֣אתָ <WH4672> u-ma-Tza-ta And foundest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לְבָבוֹ֮ <WH3824> le-va-Vo his heart נֶאֱמָ֣ן <WH539> ne-'e-Man faithful לְפָנֶיךָ֒ <WH6440> le-fa-nei-Cha before וְכָר֨וֹת <WH3772> ve-cha-Rot thee and madest עִמּ֜וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo with הַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> hab-be-Rit, a covenant לָתֵ֡ת <WH5414> la-Tet with him to give אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> 'e-Retz the land הַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֜י <WH2850> ha-chit-Ti the Hittites הָאֱמֹרִ֧י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֛י <WH6522> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzites וְהַיְבוּסִ֥י <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si and the Jebusites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֖י <WH1622> ve-hag-gir-ga-Shi and the Girgashites לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לְזַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> le-zar-'O; [it I say] to his seed וַתָּ֙קֶם֙ <WH6965> vat-Ta-kem and hast performed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <WH1697> de-va-Rei-cha, thy words כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik for thou [art] righteous אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> 'At-tah. You

וַתֵּ֛רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re And didst see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֳנִ֥י <WH6040> 'o-Ni the affliction אֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tei-nu of our fathers בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et זַעֲקָתָ֥ם <WH2201> za-'a-ka-Tam their cry שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ta and heardest עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> Suf. by the Red

וַ֠תִּתֵּן <WH5414> Vat-tit-ten And shewedst אֹתֹ֨ת <WH226> 'o-Tot signs וּמֹֽפְתִ֜ים <WH4159> u-mo-fe-Tim and wonders בְּפַרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> be-far-'Oh upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav and on all his servants וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am and on all the people אַרְצ֔וֹ <WH776> ar-Tzo, of his land כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta, for thou knewest כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for הֵזִ֖ידוּ <WH2102> he-Zi-du that they dealt proudly עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem; toward וַתַּֽעַשׂ־ <WH6213> vat-ta-'as- against them So didst thou get לְךָ֥ le-Cha שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> shem thee a name כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> ke-hai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

וְהַיָּם֙ <WH3220> ve-hai-Yam the sea בָּקַ֣עְתָּ <WH1234> ba-Ka'-ta And thou didst divide לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem, before וַיַּֽעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'av-Ru them so that they went through בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ve-toch- the midst הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> bai-yab-ba-Shah; on the dry land וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רֹ֨דְפֵיהֶ֜ם <WH7291> ro-de-fei-Hem and their persecutors הִשְׁלַ֧כְתָּ <WH7993> hish-Lach-ta thou threwest בִמְצוֹלֹ֛ת <WH4688> vim-tzo-Lot into the deeps כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- Like אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven as a stone בְּמַ֥יִם <WH4325> be-Ma-yim waters עַזִּֽים׃ <WH5794> 'az-Zim. into the mighty

וּבְעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> u-ve-'am-Mud pillar עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> 'a-Nan, by a cloudy הִנְחִיתָ֖ם <WH5148> hin-chi-Tam Moreover thou leddest יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> yo-Mam; them in the day וּבְעַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> u-ve-'am-Mud by a pillar אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> 'esh of fire לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah, and in the night לְהָאִ֣יר <WH215> le-ha-'Ir to give them light לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> la-Hem, like אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יֵֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> ye-le-chu- go בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וְעַ֤ל <WH5921> ve-'Al on הַר־ <WH2022> har- also upon mount סִינַי֙ <WH5514> si-Nai Sinai יָרַ֔דְתָּ <WH3381> ya-Rad-ta, Thou camest down וְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> ve-dab-Ber and spakest עִמָּהֶ֖ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Hem from מִשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> mish-sha-Ma-yim; with them from heaven וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vat-tit-Ten and gavest לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem מִשְׁפָּטִ֤ים <WH4941> mish-pa-Tim judgments יְשָׁרִים֙ <WH3477> ye-sha-Rim them right וְתוֹר֣וֹת <WH8451> ve-to-Rot laws אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> 'e-Met, and true חֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> chuk-Kim statutes וּמִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> u-mitz-Vot and commandments טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> to-Vim. good

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁבַּ֥ת <WH7676> shab-Bat sabbath קָדְשְׁךָ֖ <WH6944> kod-she-cha unto them thy holy הוֹדַ֣עַתָ <WH3045> ho-Da-'a-ta And madest known לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וּמִצְו֤וֹת <WH4687> u-mitz-Vot them precepts וְחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> ve-chuk-Kim statutes וְתוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> ve-to-Rah, and laws צִוִּ֣יתָ <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ta and commandedst לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha. thy servant

וְ֠לֶחֶם <WH3899> Ve-le-chem them bread מִשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven נָתַ֤תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah And gavest לָהֶם֙ la-Hem לִרְעָבָ֔ם <WH7458> lir-'a-Vam, for their hunger וּמַ֗יִם <WH4325> u-Ma-yim, water מִסֶּ֛לַע <WH5553> mis-Se-la' for them out of the rock הוֹצֵ֥אתָ <WH3318> ho-Tze-ta and broughtest forth לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לִצְמָאָ֑ם <WH6772> litz-ma-'Am; for their thirst וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and promisedst לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> la-Vo them that they should go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָשָׂ֥אתָ <WH5375> na-Sa-ta accept אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha able לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.
